Class DrawPoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • DrawPoint

  • public class DrawPoint
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an individual point which is displayed on the screen. Stores properties such as its relative position, colour, diameter and the previous point (if in line)
    Author:
    dan

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.awt.Color colour 
      private int diameter 
      private DrawPoint previous 
      private int x 
      private int y 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DrawPoint()
      Initialises point with parameters set to 0 and colour set to black
      DrawPoint(int x, int y, int diameter, java.awt.Color colour)
      Constructs a new draw point with specified parameters

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.awt.Color getColour()
      Returns colour of the point
      int getDiameter()
      Returns diameter of point
      DrawPoint getPrevious()
      Returns the previous point attached to this point
      int getX()
      Returns the top left x co-ordinate of the point relative to centre
      int getY()
      Returns the top left y co-ordinate of the point relative to centre
      void setPrevious(DrawPoint previous)
      Sets the previous point if they are to be joint in a line/curve (allows for smooth drawing)

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • DrawPoint

        public DrawPoint()
        Initialises point with parameters set to 0 and colour set to black

      • DrawPoint

        public DrawPoint(int x,
                 int y,
                 int diameter,
                 java.awt.Color colour)
        Constructs a new draw point with specified parameters
        Parameters:
        x - Relative x co-ordinate to add point (centre of point)
        y - Relative y co-ordinate to add point (centre of point)
        diameter - Diameter the point should be drawn at
        colour - Colour the point should be drawn in

    • Method Detail

      • getX

        public int getX()
        Returns the top left x co-ordinate of the point relative to centre
        Returns:
        X co-ordinate relative to centre

      • getY

        public int getY()
        Returns the top left y co-ordinate of the point relative to centre
        Returns:
        Y co-ordinate relative to centre

      • getDiameter

        public int getDiameter()
        Returns diameter of point
        Returns:
        Diameter of point

      • getColour

        public java.awt.Color getColour()
        Returns colour of the point
        Returns:
        Colour of point

      • setPrevious

        public void setPrevious(DrawPoint previous)
        Sets the previous point if they are to be joint in a line/curve (allows for smooth drawing)
        Parameters:
        previous - Reference to previous DrawPoint object

      • getPrevious

        public DrawPoint getPrevious()
        Returns the previous point attached to this point
        Returns:
        Previous point object reference
